roleset.name: perceive
roleset.note: SENSE-V NOTES: Comparison to 'see' and 'hear' and 'feel'. Member of VNcls see-30.1-1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from sense.01-v)
SENSE-N NOTES: Based on verb entry sense.01; corresponds to VNcls see-30.1-1. (from sense.01-n)

example.name: well that's a boring example
example.text: ``I sense that some people are reluctant to stick their necks out in any aggressive way until after the figures come out,'' said Richard Eakle, president of Eakle Associates, Fair Haven, Conn.
example.arg: that some people are reluctant to stick their necks out in any aggressive way until after the figures come out

example.name: Vampires with predicates
example.text: When-1 I sensed her go limp in my arm *trace*-1 I snapped out of my hungry daze.

example.name: Args 0 & 1, within LVC
example.text: But just about any successful company has a clear sense of its limitations , because otherwise it would n't be able to differentiate itself in the marketplace and reduce its vulnerablility to price wars .
example.arg: because otherwise it wouldn't be able to differentiate itself in the marketplace and reduce its vulnerablility to price wars .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Her sense of herself as a female artist, choice of materials, Jewishness, and place in the artistic pantheon are, even today, hotly debated by art

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: The stroke had a big impact on Roberto, influencing his sensation of distance and size, for example.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: These orders reflected the increased concern of Defense Minister Dmitri Ustinov over the Afghan issue, and his sensing that proposing an intervention may soon be politically acceptable to his colleagues.
example.arg: that proposing an intervention may soon be politically acceptable to his colleagues

roleset.name: be reasonable
roleset.note: SENSIBLE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from sensible.02-j)

example.name: LVB
example.text: `` It does n't make sense to parachute out at this price , '' Mr. Steinhardt says , though he has stopped his takeover talk and now commends USAir managers ' `` operating skills . ''
example.arg: to parachute out at this price

roleset.name: skilled at, capable of perceiving
roleset.note: SENSITIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on sense-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls see-30.1-1. (from sensitive.01-j)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: He is sensitive to her needs.

example.name: inanimae perceiver
example.text: This printer is sensitive to paper alignment.
